Text.Name: MetalBlockBase
Text.Item.FabaoSuffix: Metal, Seal, Stele, Dualjade, Tablet, Tower, Boulder

Text.Name: Item_IronBlock
Text.Desc: Metal bar made by casting smelted iron. Can be used in further crafting.

Text.Name: Item_CopperBlock
Text.ThingName: แท่งเหล็กไฟ
Text.Desc: Metal bar made by casting smelted Igneocopper. Can be used in further crafting.

Text.Name: Item_SilverBlock
Text.ThingName: แท่งน้ำแข็งคริสตัล
Text.Desc: Metal bar made by casting smelted Ice Crystal. Can be used in further crafting.
Text.Item.BeMaterial.NamePrefix: น้ำแข็งคริสตัล

Text.Name: Item_CopperBlock1
Text.Desc: Metal bar made by smelting a large amount of Igneocopper along with เลือดสัตว์ร้าย. It takes a long time to produce each piece.

Text.Name: Item_SilverBlock1
Text.ThingName: แท่งแกนน้ำแข็ง
Text.Desc: Metal bar made by smelting a large amount of Ice Crystals along with เลือดสัตว์ร้าย. It takes a long time to produce each piece.
Text.Item.BeMaterial.NamePrefix: แกนน้ำแข็ง

Text.Name: Item_DarksteelBlock
Text.ThingName: แท่งเหล็กดำ
Text.Desc: Metal bar made by casting smelted Darksteel. Can be used in further crafting.

Text.Name: Item_StarEssenceBlock
Text.ThingName: แท่งแกนสว่าง
Text.Desc: Metal bar made by casting smelted lumina core. Can be used in further crafting.
